rComments: AMMMMMAZING! I am in love with Tony Pollock. He is completely brilliant and hysterically funny. Best class I've ever taken (103). Minimal work, totally engaging and interesting. I want to take another class with him.
Hands donw the best English teacher I have had the pleasure of being a student of at U of I.  He is brilliantly smart without the cocky arrogrance of many professors of his stature

Tony Pollock is a philosophy major, teaching Intro to Fiction. He doesn't treat it like usual English professors; he makes it easy to understand, and interesting. He's funny, smart, and knowledgable. He doesn't make you learn things you don't need to know, and if you just go to lecture, you can get a fairly good grade.

Tony Pollock is awesome-- super helpful, very interested-- he makes you feel like you have 100% of his attention and he always has great suggestions and insights.  One of the nicest people in the English dept.
